Advanxed UX

I work in the design studio at Mercedes Benz R&D Center North America, which is basically the branch responsible for business innovation, self driving, fuel cell technolgy, advanced design, etc.

More specifically, I'm on the Advanced UX ceoncepts and enablers team. I'm working on speech interaction and natural language stuff, kinda like siri. I can't show you what's actually been going down until maybe next year's CES, but you can have a look at some projects done by our team in the past:
